name: Set IP Prefixes for LXC
description: Set local static IPv4/IPv6 properties for all local applications and enable static IP mode.

commands.command: sh -lc 'echo { "id": "use_static_ip", "value": true }; echo { "id": "ip4_prefix", "value": "192.168.4" }; echo { "id": "ip4_cidr", "value": "24" }; echo { "id": "ip6_prefix", "value": "fd00:4::" }; echo { "id": "ip6_cidr", "value": "64" }; echo { "id": "static_gw", "value": "192.168.4.1" }; echo { "id": "static_gw6", "value": "fd00:4::1" }'
